ScreenTester.title: Free Screen Test Tool: Quick Detection of Dead Pixels, Bright Spots & Light Leakage | BlackScreen
ScreenTester.description: Professional screen testing tool to help you detect dead pixels, bright spots, light leakage, and brightness uniformity on monitors, TVs, and laptop screens.
